mapper.insert: insert into dept(deptid , deptname , manager , contact , addtime , memo ) values(#{deptid} , #{deptname} , #{manager} , #{contact} , #{addtime} , #{memo} )
mapper.update: update dept set deptname=#{deptname} , manager=#{manager} , contact=#{contact} , addtime=#{addtime} , memo=#{memo} where deptid=#{deptid}
mapper.select: select a.* from dept a order by deptid desc
select a.* from dept a where deptid=#{deptid} order by deptid desc

select a.* from dept a where 1=1
and a.deptname like CONCAT('%', CONCAT(#{deptname}, '%'))
and a.manager like CONCAT('%', CONCAT(#{manager}, '%'))
and a.contact like CONCAT('%', CONCAT(#{contact}, '%'))
and a.addtime like CONCAT('%', CONCAT(#{addtime}, '%'))
and a.memo like CONCAT('%', CONCAT(#{memo}, '%'))
